xwikidoc.content: ## Classes ForumCode.TopicClass_title=Title ForumCode.TopicClass_type=Type ForumCode.TopicClass_type_question=Question ForumCode.TopicClass_type_suggestion=Suggestion ForumCode.TopicClass_type_alert=Alert ForumCode.TopicClass_type_feedback=Feedback ForumCode.TopicClass_status=Status ForumCode.TopicClass_status_inprogress=In progress ForumCode.TopicClass_status_closed=Closed ForumCode.TopicClass_status_integrated=Integrated ForumCode.TopicClass_description=Description ForumCode.AnswerClass_answer=Answer ## Forums conversations.forum.tooltip.totaltopics=Total topics conversations.forum.create=New forum conversations.forum.create.alreadyexists=The forum already exists : [[{0}>>ForumCode.{1}]] conversations.forum.create.submit=Create conversations.forum.sorttopicsby=Sort topics by conversations.forum.sorttopicsby.date=Date conversations.forum.sorttopicsby.votes=Votes conversations.forum.sorttopicsby.comments=Comments conversations.forum.titleError=The title should not be longer than 250 characters conversations.forum.title=Title conversations.forum.description=Description conversations.forum.edit=Edit Topic conversations.forum.delete=Delete Topic conversations.forum.more=Show {0} more forum.admin.action.delete.confiramtion_text=Delete this forum? forum.admin.action.delete.inprogress=Delete in progress ... forum.admin.action.delete.success=Forum deleted forum.admin.action.delete.failed=The forum could not be deleted conversations.forum.all=All forums conversations.forum.add=Add forum ## Topics conversations.topic.tooltip.totalcommentsandanswers=Total answers and comments conversations.topic.tooltip.totalanswers=Total answers conversations.topic.answer.tooltip.totalcomments=Total comments for the answer conversations.topic.create=New topic conversations.topic.create.submit=Create conversations.topic.add.activator=New topic conversations.topic.all=All topics conversations.topic.empty=No topic conversations.topic.count=topics ## Answers conversations.title=Answer conversation.add.activator=New answer conversation.delete.confirm=Delete topic? conversation.delete.confirm.withReplies=Delete this answer and its comments ? conversation.delete.done=Answer deleted conversation.delete.success=Answer deleted conversation.delete.failed=The answer could not be deleted conversation.delete.inProgress=Delete in progress ... conversation.edit=Edit answer conversation.edit.failed=The form used for creating answer could no be displayed conversation.delete=Delete answer conversation.delete.title=Delete answer conversation.edit.title=Edit answer conversation.empty=No comment conversation.forum.delete.title=Delete Topic conversation.updatedate={0} conversation.creationdate={1} conversation.groups.norights=You must be a member of this group to participate to this discussion. Please contact the group admin. conversation.norights=You do not have rights to participate in this discussion. conversations.answer.edit=Answer to topic {0} conversations.answer=Answer conversations.answer.all=All answers conversations.answer.empty=No answer conversations.answer.count=answers ## Comments conversations.comment.count=comments ## Votes conversation.like.button=Votes conversation.like.button.tooltip=Vote topic conversation.like.button.alreadyliked.tooltip=You already voted conversation.like.score.tooltip={0} users found this answer as being interesting. conversation.like.failed=The vote could not be saved: conversation.like.done=Your vote has been saved. conversation.like.loading=Saving the vote... rating.saveexception=Error while saving vote. rating.votenotvalid=The vote is not valid. rating.voteoutofbounds=The vote is not valid. ## Messages conversations.create.error.topic.norights=You don't have the rights to create a new topic. conversations.create.error.answer.norights=You don't have the rights to create a new answer. conversations.create.error.missingmetadata=The creation could not be performed because of missing metadata. conversations.create.error.missingtitle=Missing title. conversations.deleteconversation.changecomment=Deleted answer conversations.deletecomment.changecomment=Deleted comment conversations.deletecomment.error.nomailsent=Could not send mail to notify about deleting the comment. conversations.deletecomment.success=The mail to notify about comment deletion has been sent. conversations.deletecomment.error.norights=You don't have the rights to delete the comment. conversations.deletecomment.error.notfound=Comment not found. conversations.deleteconversation.error.nomailsent=Could not send mail to notify about deleting the topic. conversations.deleteconversation.success=The mail to notify about answer deletion has been sent. conversations.deleteconversation.error.norights=You don't have the rights to delete the answer. conversations.deleteconversation.error.notfound=Topic not found. core.viewers.comments.delete.failed=The comment could not be deleted. ## FLAG DIALOG conversation.flag.tooltip=Flag conversations.flag.edit=Edit conversations.flag.button=Flag conversations.flag.viewsource=View Flag Source conversations.flag.dialog.header=Flag a Comment conversations.flag.dialog.guidingquestion1.txt=What happens when you flag a comment ? conversations.flag.dialog.instruction1.txt=You submit the comment thread for immediate evaluation by Forum Administrators. conversations.flag.dialog.guidingquestion2.txt=Why are you flagging this discussion? conversations.flag.dialog.required.field.icon=* conversations.flag.dialog.instruction2.txt=I am flagging this comment because it conversations.flag.dialog.instruction3.txt=Enter a note (no more than 300 characters) describing what makes this comment objectionable: conversations.flag.dialog.reason.label=Reason conversations.flag.dialog.message.label=Description conversations.flag.dialog.mandatory=This field is mandatory conversations.flag.dialog.cancel.btt=Cancel conversations.flag.dialog.submit.btt=Submit ## REASONS FOR FLAGGING - USE IN FLAG DIALOG ForumCode.FlagClass_reason_=Select ForumCode.FlagClass_reason_1=promotes hate or violence ForumCode.FlagClass_reason_2=displays pornography ForumCode.FlagClass_reason_3=is empty or blank ForumCode.FlagClass_reason_4=is obviously commercial in nature, without clear educational relevance ForumCode.FlagClass_reason_5=is broken or has a virus ForumCode.FlagClass_reason_6=appears to be nonsensical ForumCode.FlagClass_reason_7=is objectionable for another reason ## FLAG SUCCESS MESSAGE conversations.flag.success.dialog.header=Discussion Flagged conversations.flag.success.dialog.message=You have successfully flagged this comment. conversations.flag.success.dialog.button=Close ##
